= Binary module =

Defined in files `binary.js` and `binary.so`/`binary.dll`/`binary.dylib`. To read more about binary data handling in general, see [Binary].

== Binary/F ==

This module aims to implement the [http://wiki.commonjs.org/wiki/Binary/F CommonJS Binary/F] specification.
